general.quote: It is the quality of our work which will please God, not the quantity.
general.author: Mahatma Gandhi

general.quote: The worst bankrupt in the world is the person who has lost his enthusiasm.
general.author: H. W. Arnold

general.quote: Bad things are not the worst things that can happen to us. Nothing is the worst thing that can happen to us!
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: To do all that one is able to do, is to be a man; to do all that one would like to do, is to be a god.
general.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

general.quote: There is nothing happens to any person but what was in his power to go through with.
general.author: Marcus Aurelius

general.quote: Life a culmination of the past, an awareness of the present, an indication of the future beyond knowledge, the quality that gives a touch of divinity to matter.
general.author: Charles A. Lindbergh

general.quote: Your ability to learn faster than your competition is your only sustainable competitive advantage.
general.author: Arie de Gues

general.quote: Fears are nothing more than a state of mind.
general.author: Napoleon Hill

general.quote: We do what we do because we believe.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: To give ones self earnestly to the duties due to men, and, while respecting spiritual beings, to keep aloof from them, may be called wisdom.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, vision cleared, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
general.author: Helen Keller

general.quote: All that really belongs to us is time; even he who has nothing else has that.
general.author: Baltasar Gracian

general.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing.
general.author: Abraham Lincoln

general.quote: There is not one big cosmic meaning for all, there is only the meaning we each give to our life.
general.author: Anais Nin

general.quote: Our achievements of today are but the sum total of our thoughts of yesterday. You are today where the thoughts of yesterday have brought you and you will be tomorrow where the thoughts of today take you.
general.author: Blaise Pascal

general.quote: The universe is made of stories, not atoms.
general.author: Muriel Rukeyser

general.quote: If you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it.
general.author: Margaret Fuller

general.quote: Many people have a wrong idea of what constitutes true happiness. It is not attained through self-gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
general.author: Helen Keller

general.quote: It is impossible for a man to learn what he thinks he already knows.
general.author: Epictetus

general.quote: A day of worry is more exhausting than a day of work.
general.author: John Lubbock

general.quote: To be able to give away riches is mandatory if you wish to possess them. This is the only way that you will be truly rich.
general.author: Mahummad Ali

general.quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
general.author: Bruce Lee

general.quote: Stay away from what might have been and look at what will be.
general.author: Marsha Petrie Sue

general.quote: He is able who thinks he is able.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: The Creator has not given you a longing to do that which you have no ability to do.
general.author: Orison Marden

general.quote: There is no greater harm than that of time wasted.
general.author: Michelangelo

general.quote: Only through our connectedness to others can we really know and enhance the self. And only through working on the self can we begin to enhance our connectedness to others.
general.author: Harriet Lerner

general.quote: Look with favour upon a bold beginning.
general.author: Virgil

general.quote: One of the advantages of being disorderly is that one is constantly making exciting discoveries.
general.author: A. A. Milne

general.quote: Men in general judge more from appearances than from reality. All men have eyes, but few have the gift of penetration.
general.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

general.quote: If you seek truth you will not seek victory by dishonourable means, and if you find truth you will become invincible.
general.author: Epictetus

general.quote: Something opens our wings. Something makes boredom and hurt disappear. Someone fills the cup in front of us: We taste only sacredness.
general.author: Rumi

general.quote: Learn wisdom from the ways of a seedling. A seedling which is never hardened off through stressful situations will never become a strong productive plant.
general.author: Stephen Sigmund

general.quote: The bird of paradise alights only upon the hand that does not grasp.
general.author: John Berry

general.quote: Try not to become a man of success but rather try to become a man of value.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: Do what you can. Want what you have. Be who you are.
general.author: Forrest Church

general.quote: We could never learn to be brave and patient if there were only joy in the world.
general.author: Helen Keller

general.quote: To understand the heart and mind of a person, look not at what he has already achieved, but at what he aspires to do.
general.author: Kahlil Gibran

general.quote: Four steps to achievement: Plan purposefully. Prepare prayerfully. Proceed positively. Pursue persistently.
general.author: William Arthur Ward

general.quote: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal: my strength lies solely in my tenacity
general.author: Louis Pasteur

general.quote: The greatest way to live with honour in this world is to be what we pretend to be.
general.author: Socrates

general.quote: To change ones life, start immediately, do it flamboyantly, no exceptions.
general.author: William James

general.quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
general.author: Rumi

general.quote: The possibilities are numerous once we decide to act and not react.
general.author: George Bernard Shaw

general.quote: I never see what has been done; I only see what remains to be done.
general.author: Marie Curie

general.quote: Life is not measured by the breaths you take, but by its breathtaking moments.
general.author: Michael Vance

general.quote: History will be kind to me for I intend to write it.
general.author: Winston Churchill

general.quote: Can you imagine what I would do if I could do all I can?
general.author: Sun Tzu

general.quote: To want to be what one can be is purpose in life.
general.author: Cynthia Ozick

general.quote: Nothing diminishes anxiety faster than action.
general.author: Walter Anderson

general.quote: Better than a thousand hollow words is one word that brings peace.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: A thing long expected takes the form of the unexpected when at last it comes.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: Love at first sight is easy to understand; its when two people have been looking at each other for a lifetime that it becomes a miracle.
general.author: Amy Bloom

general.quote: Error is discipline through which we advance.
general.author: Channing

general.quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
general.author: Mother Teresa

general.quote: By believing passionately in something that does not yet exist, we create it.
general.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

general.quote: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
general.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

general.quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dream, and endeavours to live the life which he had imagines, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
general.author: Henry David Thoreau

general.quote: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
general.author: Augustinus Sanctus

general.quote: The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve most of the worlds problems.
general.author: Mohandas Gandhi

general.quote: He who knows others is wise. He who knows himself is enlightened.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: Goals are the fuel in the furnace of achievement.
general.author: Brian Tracy

general.quote: Why worry about things you can’t control when you can keep yourself busy controlling the things that depend on you?
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: You only lose what you cling to.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Anyone who proposes to do good must not expect people to roll stones out of his way, but must accept his lot calmly if they even roll a few more upon it.
general.author: Albert Schweitzer

general.quote: To effectively communicate, we must realize that we are all different in the way we perceive the world and use this understanding as a guide to our communication with others.
general.author: Anthony Robbins

general.quote: When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: When there is no enemy within, the enemies outside cannot hurt you.
general.author: African proverb

general.quote: May our hearts garden of awakening bloom with hundreds of flowers.
general.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

general.quote: The mark of your ignorance is the depth of your belief in injustice and tragedy. What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the Master calls the butterfly.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For while knowledge defines all we currently know and understand, imagination points to all we might yet discover and create.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: You cannot find yourself by going into the past. You can find yourself by coming into the present.
general.author: Eckhart Tolle

general.quote: If one is lucky, a solitary fantasy can totally transform one million realities.
general.author: Maya Angelou

general.quote: No man ever reached to excellence in any one art or profession without having passed through the slow and painful process of study and preparation.
general.author: Horace

general.quote: The world turns aside to let any man pass who knows where he is going.
general.author: Epictetus

general.quote: I have an everyday religion that works for me. Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line.
general.author: Lucille Ball

general.quote: People seldom notice old clothes if you wear a big smile.
general.author: Lee Mildon

general.quote: I will not be concerned at other men is not knowing me;I will be concerned at my own want of ability.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Most of our obstacles would melt away if, instead of cowering before them, we should make up our minds to walk boldly through them.
general.author: Orison Marden

general.quote: A single conversation across the table with a wise person is worth a months study of books.
general.author: Chinese Proverb

general.quote: Creativity comes from trust. Trust your instincts. And never hope more than you work.
general.author: Rita Mae Brown

general.quote: Saying thank you is more than good manners. It is good spirituality.
general.author: Alfred Painter

general.quote: Not every difficult and dangerous thing is suitable for training, but only that which is conducive to success in achieving the object of our effort.
general.author: Epictetus

general.quote: It is easier to live through someone else than to become complete yourself.
general.author: Betty Friedan

general.quote: Just as much as we see in others we have in ourselves.
general.author: William Hazlitt

general.quote: As you think, so you are. As you dream, so you become. As you create your wishes, so they create you.
general.author: Wendy Garrett

general.quote: Fortune favours the brave.
general.author: Virgil

general.quote: Things that were hard to bear are sweet to remember.
general.author: Seneca

general.quote: The only Zen you find on the tops of mountains is the Zen you bring up there.
general.author: Robert Pirsig

general.quote: If we could see the miracle of a single flower clearly, our whole life would change.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Every sixty seconds you spend angry, upset or mad, is a full minute of happiness you’ll never get back.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Someone is special only if you tell them.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: When deeds speak, words are nothing.
general.author: African Proverb

general.quote: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Skill to do comes of doing.
general.author: Ralph Emerson

general.quote: The most complicated achievements of thought are possible without the assistance of consciousness.
general.author: Sigmund Freud

general.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
general.author: Tony Robbins

general.quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
general.author: Elbert Hubbard

general.quote: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.

general.quote: Iron rusts from disuse; water loses its purity from stagnation... even so does inaction sap the vigour of the mind.

general.quote: It is not the mistake that has the most power, instead, it is learning from the mistake to advance your own attributes.
general.author: Byron Roberts

general.quote: Practice yourself, for heavens sake in little things, and then proceed to greater.
general.author: Epictetus

general.quote: The heart has its reasons which reason knows not of.
general.author: Blaise Pascal

general.quote: When you meet someone better than yourself, turn your thoughts to becoming his equal. When you meet someone not as good as you are, look within and examine your own self.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity.
general.author: Albert Schweitzer

general.quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
general.author: Benjamin Disraeli

general.quote: Wherever a man may happen to turn, whatever a man may undertake, he will always end up by returning to the path which nature has marked out for him.
general.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

general.quote: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: Worry gives a small thing a big shadow.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Everything that exists is in a manner the seed of that which will be.
general.author: Marcus Aurelius

general.quote: Kindness is the greatest wisdom.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: To know oneself is to study oneself in action with another person.
general.author: Bruce Lee

general.quote: Self-complacency is fatal to progress.
general.author: Margaret Sangster

general.quote: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. And today? Today is a gift. That is why we call it the present.

general.quote: When one tugs at a single thing in nature, he finds it attached to the rest of the world.
general.author: John Muir

general.quote: Forgiveness is choosing to love. It is the first skill of self-giving love.
general.author: Mohandas Gandhi

general.quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.

general.quote: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
general.author: Pablo Picasso

general.quote: Love is not blind; it simply enables one to see things others fail to see.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Decision is a risk rooted in the courage of being free.
general.author: Paul Tillich

general.quote: We learn wisdom from failure much more than from success. We often discover what will do, by finding out what will not do; and probably he who never made a mistake never made a discovery.
general.author: Samuel Smiles

general.quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones weve been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
general.author: Barack Obama

general.quote: All our knowledge begins with the senses, proceeds then to the understanding, and ends with reason. There is nothing higher than reason.
general.author: Immanuel Kant

general.quote: Personal transformation can and does have global effects. As we go, so goes the world, for the world is us. The revolution that will save the world is ultimately a personal one.
general.author: Marianne Williamson

general.quote: Simply put, you believer that things or people make you unhappy, but this is not accurate. You make yourself unhappy.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: To be wronged is nothing unless you continue to remember it.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
general.author: Tony Robbins

general.quote: If you surrender to the wind, you can ride it.
general.author: Toni Morrison

general.quote: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
general.author: Henry Ford

general.quote: Good thoughts are no better than good dreams, unless they be executed.
general.author: Ralph Emerson

general.quote: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
general.author: Mother Teresa

general.quote: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking together in the same direction.
general.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

general.quote: There surely is in human nature an inherent propensity to extract all the good out of all the evil.
general.author: Benjamin Haydon

general.quote: Efficiency is doing things right; effectiveness is doing the right things.

general.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.

general.quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.

general.quote: Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
general.author: Seneca

general.quote: At first you may not have succeeded, but neither did Albert Einstein.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be.
general.author: Bruce Lee

general.quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: Sometimes our fate resembles a fruit tree in winter. Who would think that those branches would turn green again and blossom, but we hope it, we know it.
general.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

general.quote: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.
general.author: Edmund Burke

general.quote: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
general.author: Carl Jung

general.quote: Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.
general.author: Plato

general.quote: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Life is a progress, and not a station.
general.author: Ralph Emerson

general.quote: It is the greatest of all mistakes to do nothing because you can only do little — do what you can.
general.author: Sydney Smith

general.quote: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honourable but more useful than a life spent in doing nothing.
general.author: Bernard Shaw

general.quote: Love is just a word until someone comes along and gives it meaning.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Perseverance is a great element of success. If you only knock long enough and loud enough at the gate, you are sure to wake up somebody.
general.author: Henry Longfellow

general.quote: Discovery consists of seeing what everybody has seen and thinking what nobody else has thought.
general.author: Jonathan Swift

general.quote: The dream was always running ahead of me. To catch up, to live for a moment in unison with it, that was the miracle.
general.author: Anais Nin

general.quote: The universe is full of magical things, patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
general.author: Eden Phillpotts

general.quote: People are so constituted that everybody would rather undertake what they see others do, whether they have an aptitude for it or not.
general.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

general.quote: I cannot give you the formula for success, but I can give you the formula for failure: which is: Try to please everybody.
general.author: Herbert Swope

general.quote: There is one thing you have got to learn about our movement. Three people are better than no people.
general.author: Fannie Hamer

general.quote: Anything you really want, you can attain, if you really go after it.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: To enjoy life, we must touch much of it lightly.
general.author: Voltaire

general.quote: To dare is to lose ones footing momentarily. To not dare is to lose oneself.
general.author: Soren Kierkegaard

general.quote: Your work is to discover your world and then with all your heart give yourself to it.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: The happy and efficient people in this world are those who accept trouble as a normal detail of human life and resolve to capitalize it when it comes along.
general.author: H. Bertram Lewis

general.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Correction does much, but encouragement does more.
general.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

general.quote: A subtle thought that is in error may yet give rise to fruitful inquiry that can establish truths of great value.
general.author: Isaac Asimov

general.quote: A leader or a man of action in a crisis almost always acts subconsciously and then thinks of the reasons for his action.
general.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

general.quote: The cause is hidden. The effect is visible to all.
general.author: Ovid

general.quote: How wonderful that we have met with a paradox. Now we have some hope of making progress.
general.author: Niels Bohr

general.quote: Nothing ever goes away until it has taught us what we need to know.
general.author: Pema Chodron

general.quote: The greatest obstacle to connecting with our joy is resentment.
general.author: Pema Chodron

general.quote: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously. This is how character is built.
general.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

general.quote: On every thorn, delightful wisdom grows, In every rill a sweet instruction flows.
general.author: Edward Young

general.quote: What is not started today is never finished tomorrow.
general.author: Goethe

general.quote: God always takes the simplest way.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: No one has a finer command of language than the person who keeps his mouth shut.
general.author: Sam Rayburn

general.quote: Reason and free inquiry are the only effectual agents against error.
general.author: Thomas Jefferson

general.quote: Everything in the universe goes by indirection. There are no straight lines.
general.author: Ralph Emerson

general.quote: As far as your self-control goes, as far goes your freedom.
general.author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

general.quote: What worries you masters you.
general.author: Haddon Robinson

general.quote: As you think, so shall you become.
general.author: Bruce Lee

general.quote: To be happy is to be able to become aware of oneself without fright.
general.author: Walter Benjamin

general.quote: You get peace of mind not by thinking about it or imagining it, but by quietening and relaxing the restless mind.
general.author: Remez Sasson

general.quote: If we are facing in the right direction, all we have to do is keep on walking.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: We can only learn to love by loving.
general.author: Iris Murdoch

general.quote: Almost everything comes from nothing.
general.author: Henri Amiel

general.quote: If you cannot be silent be brilliant and thoughtful.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: When you learn, teach. When you get, give.
general.author: Maya Angelou

general.quote: Nothing is predestined: The obstacles of your past can become the gateways that lead to new beginnings.
general.author: Ralph Blum

general.quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: True silence is the rest of the mind; it is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment and refreshment.
general.author: William Penn

general.quote: Do not give your attention to what others do or fail to do; give it to what you do or fail to do.
general.author: Dhammapada

general.quote: Wisdom is the supreme part of happiness.
general.author: Sophocles

general.quote: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
general.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

general.quote: You block your dream when you allow your fear to grow bigger than your faith.
general.author: Mary Morrissey

general.quote: Speak low, if you speak love.
general.author: William Shakespeare

general.quote: By nature man hates change; seldom will he quit his old home till it has actually fallen around his ears.
general.author: Thomas Carlyle

general.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: The best way out is always through.
general.author: Robert Frost

general.quote: Never deny a diagnosis, but do deny the negative verdict that may go with it.
general.author: Norman Cousins

general.quote: You have to take it as it happens, but you should try to make it happen the way you want to take it.
general.author: Old German proverb

general.quote: You need chaos in your soul to give birth to a dancing star.
general.author: Nietzsche

general.quote: Feeling and longing are the motive forces behind all human endeavor and human creations.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: Neither genius, fame, nor love show the greatness of the soul. Only kindness can do that.
general.author: Jean Lacordaire

general.quote: Invent your world. Surround yourself with people, color, sounds, and work that nourish you.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: There are no limitations to the mind except those we acknowledge.
general.author: Napoleon Hill

general.quote: Any word you have to hunt for in a thesaurus is the wrong word. There are no exceptions to this rule.
general.author: Stephen King

general.quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world right in the eye.
general.author: Helen Keller

general.quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
general.author: Napoleon Hill

general.quote: Freedom is not worth having if it does not connote freedom to err.
general.author: Mohandas Gandhi

general.quote: Love and kindness are never wasted. They always make a difference. They bless the one who receives them, and they bless you, the giver.
general.author: Barbara De Angelis

general.quote: Never tell me the sky’s the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Watch the little things; a small leak will sink a great ship.
general.author: Benjamin Franklin

general.quote: I endeavour to be wise when I cannot be merry, easy when I cannot be glad, content with what cannot be mended and patient when there is no redress.
general.author: Elizabeth Montagu

general.quote: The greatest minds are capable of the greatest vices as well as of the greatest virtues.
general.author: Rene Descartes

general.quote: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
general.author: William Ward

general.quote: Many people think of prosperity that concerns money only to forget that true prosperity is of the mind.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: Our true wealth is the good we do in this world. None of us has faith unless we desire for our neighbours what we desire for ourselves.
general.author: Mohammed

general.quote: There are basically two types of people. People who accomplish things, and people who claim to have accomplished things. The first group is less crowded.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen, nor touched... but are felt in the heart.
general.author: Helen Keller

general.quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak but their echoes are truly endless.
general.author: Mother Teresa

general.quote: Nothing could be worse than the fear that one had given up too soon, and left one unexpended effort that might have saved the world.
general.author: Jane Addams

general.quote: A beautiful thing is never perfect.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Through meditation and by giving full attention to one thing at a time, we can learn to direct attention where we choose.
general.author: Eknath Easwaran

general.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
general.author: Tony Robbins

general.quote: It is better to take many small steps in the right direction than to make a great leap forward only to stumble backward.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: What we think, we become.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Reviewing what you have learned and learning anew, you are fit to be a teacher.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Our lives are a sum total of the choices we have made.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: The most decisive actions of our life... are most often unconsidered actions.
general.author: André Gide

general.quote: You cannot make yourself feel something you do not feel, but you can make yourself do right in spite of your feelings.
general.author: Pearl Buck

general.quote: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don’t need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself.
general.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

general.quote: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change.
general.author: Thomas Hardy

general.quote: Success means having the courage, the determination, and the will to become the person you believe you were meant to be.
general.author: George Sheehan

general.quote: Many people have gone further than they thought they could because someone else thought they could.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, nor to worry about the future, but to live the present moment wisely and earnestly.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Doing nothing is better than being busy doing nothing.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: Your future depends on many things, but mostly on you.
general.author: Frank Tyger

general.quote: If you lose today, win tomorrow. In this never-ending spirit of challenge is the heart of a victor.
general.author: Daisaku Ikeda

general.quote: The happiness that is genuinely satisfying is accompanied by the fullest exercise of our faculties and the fullest realization of the world in which we live.
general.author: Bertrand Russell

general.quote: Since you alone are responsible for your thoughts, only you can change them.
general.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

general.quote: It is only when the mind and character slumber that the dress can be seen.
general.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

general.quote: Love the moment. Flowers grow out of dark moments. Therefore, each moment is vital. It affects the whole. Life is a succession of such moments and to live each, isto succeed.
general.author: Corita Kent

general.quote: Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
general.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

general.quote: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
general.author: Brian Tracy

general.quote: Happiness does not come from having much, but from being attached to little.
general.author: Cheng Yen

general.quote: It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours. It cannot be taken from you, not by angels or by demons, heaven or hell.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
general.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

general.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
general.author: Aesop

general.quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
general.author: Aristotle

general.quote: A man is not old as long as he is seeking something.
general.author: Edmond Rostand

general.quote: If you want to study yourself — look into the hearts of other people. If you want to study other people — look into your own heart.
general.author: Friedrich von Schiller

general.quote: There are things so deep and complex that only intuition can reach it in our stage of development as human beings.
general.author: John Astin

general.quote: Argue for your limitations, and sure enough theyre yours.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: Beware of the half truth. You may have gotten hold of the wrong half.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
general.author: Marcus Aurelius

general.quote: The young people who come to me in the hope of hearing me utter a few memorable maxims are quite disappointed. Aphorisms are not my forte, I say nothing but banalities... I listen to them and they go away delighted.
general.author: Andre Gide

general.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
general.author: Leo Tolstoy

general.quote: As the rest of the world is walking out the door, your best friends are the ones walking in.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: The conditions of conquest are always easy. We have but to toil awhile, endure awhile, believe always, and never turn back.
general.author: Seneca

general.quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
general.author: Ralph Emerson

general.quote: They say that time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
general.author: Andy Warhol

general.quote: To know your purpose is to live a life of direction, and in that direction is found peace and tranquillity.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: To ensure good health: eat lightly, breathe deeply, live moderately, cultivate cheerfulness, and maintain an interest in life.
general.author: William Londen

general.quote: I have done my best: that is about all the philosophy of living one needs.
general.author: Lin-yutang

general.quote: If we did the things we are capable of, we would astound ourselves.
general.author: Thomas Edison

general.quote: With every experience, you alone are painting your own canvas, thought by thought, choice by choice.
general.author: Oprah Winfrey

general.quote: All action results from thought, so it is thoughts that matter.
general.author: Sai Baba

general.quote: Bite off more than you can chew, then chew it.
general.author: Ella Williams

general.quote: Rather than wishing for change, you first must be prepared to change.
general.author: Catherine Pulsifer

general.quote: To will is to select a goal, determine a course of action that will bring one to that goal, and then hold to that action till the goal is reached. The key is action.
general.author: Michael Hanson

general.quote: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
general.author: Abraham Lincoln

general.quote: He who deliberates fully before taking a step will spend his entire life on one leg.
general.author: Chinese Proverb

general.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
general.author: Peter Drucker

general.quote: Thought is the sculptor who can create the person you want to be.
general.author: Henry Thoreau

general.quote: If you break your neck, if you have nothing to eat, if your house is on fire, then you got a problem. Everything else is inconvenience.
general.author: Robert Fulghum

general.quote: There are no failures — just experiences and your reactions to them.
general.author: Tom Krause

general.quote: Argue for your limitations, and sure enough they're yours.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: If you look over your left shoulder and it is saying to go this and your other shoulder is telling you to go the other way. Then just follow your heart and you will be OK.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
general.author: Barack Obama

general.quote: Chaos is inherent in all compounded things. Strive on with diligence.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: All great achievements require time.
general.author: Maya Angelou

general.quote: We fail to realize that mastery is not about perfection. It's about a process, a journey. The master is the one who stays on the path day after day, year after year. The master is the one who is willing to try, and fail, and try again, for as long as he or she lives.
general.author: George Leonard, Mastery.

general.quote: Are you willing to wear your white belt?
general.author: George Leonard, Mastery.

general.quote: You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
general.author: A.A. Mine

general.quote: Everyone has inside them a piece of good news. The good news is you don’t know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is.
general.author: Anne Frank

general.quote: Press on - nothing can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Perseverance and determination alone are omnipotent.
general.author: Calvin Coolidge

general.quote: Experience is not what happens to you; it is what you do with what happens to you.
general.author: Aldous Huxley

general.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
general.author: Edmund Hillary

general.quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
general.author: Og Mandino

general.quote: It doesn’t matter how slow you go as long as you don’t stop.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
general.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

general.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
general.author: Theodore Roosevelt

general.quote: Embrace uncertainty. Some of the most beautiful chapters in our lives won’t have a title until much later.
general.author: Bob Goff

general.quote: And you ask ‘What if I fall?’ Oh but my darling, what if you fly?
general.author: Erin Hanson

general.quote: Each day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.
general.author: Rosemonde Gerard

general.quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
general.author: Angelita Lim

general.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
general.author: John Wooden

general.quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination. Joy is found not in finishing an activity but in doing it.
general.author: Greg Anderson

general.quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
general.author: Helen Keller

general.quote: When we stop opposing reality, action becomes simple, fluid, kind, and fearless.
general.author: Byron Katie

general.quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
general.author: Winston Churchill

general.quote: I can’t promise to fix all your problems, but I can promise you won’t have to face them all alone.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything.
general.author: T. Tolis

general.quote: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
general.author: Christopher Robin

general.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
general.author: Mahatma Gandhi

general.quote: If you focus on what you left behind, you will never see what lies ahead.
general.author: Gusteau, Ratatouille

general.quote: Remember you’re the one who can fill the world with sunshine.
general.author: Snow White

general.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says ‘I’m possible’!
general.author: Audrey Hepburn

general.quote: If you have good thoughts they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely.
general.author: Roald Dahl

general.quote: Before you act, listen. Before you react, think. Before you spend, earn. Before you criticize, wait. Before you pray, forgive. Before you quit, try.
general.author: Ernest Hemingway

general.quote: Never look back, darling. It distracts for the now.
general.author: Edna Mode, The Incredibles

general.quote: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way.
general.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

general.quote: Winning doesn’t always mean being first. Winning means you’re doing better than you’ve done before.
general.author: Bonnie Blair

general.quote: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
general.author: Dr. Seuss

general.quote: Be Silly, Be Honest, Be Kind.
general.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

general.quote: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever - the one who recognizes the challenges and does something about it.
general.author: Vince Lombardi

general.quote: A ship is always safe at the shore - but that is NOT what it is built for.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: Next to trying and winning, the best thing is trying and failing.
general.author: L.M. Montgomery

general.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
general.author: Nelson Mandela

general.quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
general.author: Michael Jordan

general.quote: Every small positive change we make in ourselves repays us in confidence in the future.
general.author: Alice Walker

general.quote: Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine.
general.author: Mario Fernandez

general.quote: Your destiny is to fulfill those things upon which you focus most intently. So choose to keep your focus on that which is truly magnificent, beautiful, uplifting and joyful. Your life is always moving toward something.
general.author: Ralph Marston

general.quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
general.author: John Lennon

general.quote: We are each gifted in a unique and important way. It is our privilege and our adventure to discover our own special light.
general.author: Mary Dunbar

general.quote: Those who follow the banners of reason are like the well-disciplined battalions which, wearing a more sober uniform and making a less dazzling show than the light troops commanded by imagination, enjoy more safety, and even more honor, in the conflicts of human life.
general.author: Sir Walter Scott

general.quote: A good deal of philanthropy arises in general from mere vanity and love of distinction gilded over to others and to themselves with some show of benevolent sentiment.
general.author: Sir Walter Scott

general.quote: Credit is like a looking glass, which, when once sullied by a breath, may be wiped clear again, but if once cracked can never be repaired.
general.author: Sir Walter Scott

general.quote: We can secure other people’s approval if we do right and try hard; but our own is worth a hundred of it, and no way has been found out of securing that.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: Who will adhere to him that abandons himself?
general.author: Philip Sidney

general.quote: It is the hardest thing in the world to be a good thinker without being a good self examiner.
general.author: Lord Shaftesbury

general.quote: Truly, this world can get on without us, if we would but think so.
general.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

general.quote: Whatever task you undertake, do it with all your heart and soul. Always be courteous, never be discouraged. Beware of him who promises something for nothing. Do not blame anybody for your mistakes and failures. Do not look for approval except the consciousness of doing your best.
general.author: Bernard M. Baruch

general.quote: Each of us is an impregnable fortress that can be laid waste only from within.
general.author: Timothy J. Flynn

general.quote: What is best for people is what they do for themselves.
general.author: Benjamin Franklin

general.quote: Man is a wonder to himself; he can neither govern nor know himself.
general.author: Benjamin Whichcote

general.quote: Self-distrust is the cause of most of our failures. In the assurance of strength, there is strength, and they are the weakest, however strong, who have no faith in themselves or their own powers.
general.author: Christian Bovée

general.quote: The world will always be governed by self-interest: we should not try to stop this: we should try and make the self-interest of cads a little more coincident with that of decent people.
general.author: Samuel Butler

general.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: You'll see it when you believe it.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: It's easier to see the mistakes on someone else's paper.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Talk doesn't cook rice.
general.author: Chinese proverb

general.quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
general.author: John Lennon

general.quote: You give before you get.
general.author: Napoleon Hill

general.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
general.author: Bo Jackson

general.quote: Don't ruin the present with the ruined past.
general.author: Ellen Gilchrist

general.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
general.author: Anais Nin

general.quote: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
general.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

general.quote: You can do what's reasonable or you can decide what's possible.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Friendship isn't a big thing. It's a million little things.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: If the shoe doesn't fit, must we change the foot?
general.author: Gloria Steinem

general.quote: To bring anything into your life, imagine that it's already there.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: Someone remembers, someone cares; your name is whispered in someone's prayers.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Don't be pushed by your problems; be led by your dreams.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
general.author: Victor Hugo

general.quote: Never ignore a gut feeling, but never believe that it's enough.
general.author: Robert Heller

general.quote: Put your future in good hands � your own.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Fortune befriends the bold.
general.author: John Dryden

general.quote: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
general.author: Mike Ditka

general.quote: Don't compromise yourself. You are all you've got.
general.author: Janis Joplin

general.quote: What you see depends on what you're looking for.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
general.author: Dr. Seuss

general.quote: Yesterdays home runs don't win today's games.
general.author: Babe Ruth

general.quote: Don't smother each other. No one can grow in the shade.
general.author: Leo F. Buscaglia

general.quote: You can't shake hands with a clenched fist.
general.author: Indira Gandhi

general.quote: Love doesn't make the world go round, love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
general.author: Elizabeth Browning

general.quote: Whenever you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.
general.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

general.quote: Be thankful when you don't know something for it gives you the opportunity to learn.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: In separateness lies the world's great misery, in compassion lies the world's true strength.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Letting go isn�t the end of the world; it�s the beginning of a new life.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: If you don't know where you are going, you will probably end up somewhere else.
general.author: Lawrence Peter

general.quote: To be upset over what you don't have is to waste what you do have.
general.author: Ken S. Keyes

general.quote: We learn what we have said from those who listen to our speaking.
general.author: Kenneth Patton

general.quote: Don't focus on making the right decision, focus on making the decision the right one.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Everything is perfect in the universe � even your desire to improve it.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: I don't believe in failure. It is not failure if you enjoyed the process.
general.author: Oprah Winfrey

general.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
general.author: Maya Angelou

general.quote: I'm not afraid of storms, for Im learning how to sail my ship.
general.author: Louisa Alcott

general.quote: How we spend our days is, of course, how we spend our lives.
general.author: Annie Dillard

general.quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
general.author: Napoleon Hill

general.quote: If you think you can, you can. And if you think you can't, you're right.
general.author: Henry Ford

general.quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.
general.author: Winston Churchill

general.quote: There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you it's going to be a butterfly.
general.author: Buckminster Fuller

general.quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
general.author: Bruce Lee

general.quote: Don't be afraid to go out on a limb. That's where the fruit is.
general.author: H. Jackson Browne

general.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds you plant.
general.author: Robert Stevenson

general.quote: If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, you'll never enjoy the sunshine.
general.author: Morris West

general.quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
general.author: Les Brown

general.quote: Every day may not be good, but there's something good in every day.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Some people think it's holding that makes one strong � sometimes it's letting go.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Transformation doesn't take place with a vacuum; instead, it occurs when we are indirectly and directly connected to all those around us.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: The only difference between your abilities and others is the ability to put yourself in their shoes and actually try.
general.author: Leonardo Ruiz

general.quote: Don't leave a stone unturned. It's always something, to know you have done the most you could.
general.author: Charles Dickens

general.quote: There is no retirement for an artist, it's your way of living so there is no end to it.
general.author: Henry Moore

general.quote: Why worry about things you can�t control when you can keep yourself busy controlling the things that depend on you?
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
general.author: Laozi

general.quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
general.author: Thomas Jefferson

general.quote: I'm a great believer in luck and I find the harder I work, the more I have of it.
general.author: Thomas Jefferson

general.quote: Good people are good because they've come to wisdom through failure. We get very little wisdom from success, you know.
general.author: William Saroyan

general.quote: Your destiny isn't just fate; it is how you use your own developed abilities to get what you want.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: You got to be careful if you don't know where you're going, because you might not get there.
general.author: Yogi Berra

general.quote: You can't let praise or criticism get to you. It's a weakness to get caught up in either one.
general.author: John Wooden

general.quote: Until you value yourself, you won't value your time. Until you value your time, you won't do anything with it.
general.author: M. Scott Peck

general.quote: If we have a positive mental attitude, then even when surrounded by hostility, we shall not lack inner peace.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: There is only one success � to be able to spend your life in your own way.
general.author: Christopher Morley

general.quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
general.author: Aldous Huxley

general.quote: You're not obligated to win. You're obligated to keep trying to do the best you can every day.
general.author: Marian Edelman

general.quote: You may be deceived if you trust too much, but you will live in torment if you don't trust enough.
general.author: Frank Crane

general.quote: All that is necessary is to accept the impossible, do without the indispensable, and bear the intolerable.
general.author: Kathleen Norris

general.quote: Patience is a virtue but you will never ever accomplish anything if you don't exercise action over patience.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: Any of us can achieve virtue, if by virtue we merely mean the avoidance of the vices that do not attract us.
general.author: Robert Lynd

general.quote: Peace is not something you wish for. It's something you make, something you do, something you are, and something you give away.
general.author: Robert Fulghum

general.quote: Genuine love should first be directed at oneself � if we do not love ourselves, how can we love others?
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Learn all you can from the mistakes of others. You won't have time to make them all yourself.
general.author: Alfred Sheinwold

general.quote: It is the greatest of all mistakes to do nothing because you can only do little � do what you can.
general.author: Sydney Smith

general.quote: Aerodynamically the bumblebee shouldn't be able to fly, but the bumblebee doesn't know that so it goes on flying anyway.
general.author: Mary Kay Ash

general.quote: A good teacher is like a candle � it consumes itself to light the way for others.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Consider how hard it is to change yourself and you'll understand what little chance you have in trying to change others.
general.author: Jacob Braude

general.quote: If you'll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives.
general.author: Vince Lombardi

general.quote: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don�t need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself.
general.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

general.quote: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.
general.author: Buddha

general.quote: Don't wait for your feelings to change to take the action. Take the action and your feelings will change.
general.author: Barbara Baron

general.quote: Mind is everything: muscle, pieces of rubber. All that I am, I am because of my mind.
general.author: Paavo Nurmi

general.quote: He that never changes his opinions, never corrects his mistakes, and will never be wiser on the morrow than he is today.
general.author: Tryon Edwards

general.quote: I'm not interested in age. People who tell me their age are silly. You're as old as you feel.
general.author: Elizabeth Arden

general.quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: He can who thinks he can, and he can't who thinks he can't. This is an inexorable, indisputable law.
general.author: Pablo Picasso

general.quote: People take different roads seeking fulfilment and happiness. Just because theyre not on your road doesn't mean they've gotten lost.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: Giving up doesn't always mean you are weak. Sometimes it means that you are strong enough to let go.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you'd have preferred to talk.
general.author: Doug Larson

general.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
general.author: Thomas Edison

general.quote: If you're walking down the right path and you're willing to keep walking, eventually you'll make progress.
general.author: Barack Obama

general.quote: Give it all you've got because you never know if there's going to be a next time.
general.author: Danielle Ingrum

general.quote: Im not in this world to live up to your expectations and you're not in this world to live up to mine.
general.author: Bruce Lee

general.quote: I can't imagine a person becoming a success who doesn't give this game of life everything hes got.
general.author: Walter Cronkite

general.quote: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. And today? Today is a gift that's why they call it the present.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: You can only grow if you're willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
general.author: Brian Tracy

general.quote: To free us from the expectations of others, to give us back to ourselves � there lies the great, singular power of self-respect.
general.author: Joan Didion

general.quote: When you don't know what you believe, everything becomes an argument. Everything is debatable. But when you stand for something, decisions are obvious.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Every sixty seconds you spend angry, upset or mad, is a full minute of happiness you�ll never get back.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: When you begin to touch your heart or let your heart be touched, you begin to discover that it's bottomless.
general.author: Pema Chodron

general.quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.
general.author: Alan Watts

general.quote: The aim of life is self-development. To realize ones nature perfectly � that is what each of us is here for.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Some people thrive on huge, dramatic change. Some people prefer the slow and steady route. Do what's right for you.
general.author: Julie Morgenstern

general.quote: Arrogance and rudeness are training wheels on the bicycle of life � for weak people who cannot keep their balance without them.
general.author: Laura Teresa Marquez

general.quote: When you have got an elephant by the hind legs and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
general.author: Abraham Lincoln

general.quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: The poor man is not he who is without a cent, but he who is without a dream.
general.author: Harry Kemp

general.quote: You have power over your mind � not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
general.author: Marcus Aurelius

general.quote: What matters is the value we've created in our lives, the people we've made happy and how much we've grown as people.
general.author: Daisaku Ikeda

general.quote: When you are offended at any man's fault, turn to yourself and study your own failings. Then you will forget your anger.
general.author: Epictetus

general.quote: Those who are blessed with the most talent don't necessarily outperform everyone else. It's the people with follow-through who excel.
general.author: Mary Kay Ash

general.quote: People of mediocre ability sometimes achieve outstanding success because they don't know when to quit. Most men succeed because they are determined to.
general.author: George Allen

general.quote: Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyse you, they're supposed to help you discover who you are.
general.author: Bernice Reagon

general.quote: You can't create in a vacuum. Life gives you the material and dreams can propel new beginnings.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: The person who lives life fully, glowing with life's energy, is the person who lives a successful life.
general.author: Daisaku Ikeda

general.quote: Don't turn away from possible futures before you're certain you don't have anything to learn from them.
general.author: Richard Bach

general.quote: You won't skid if you stay in a rut.
general.author: Kin Hubbard

general.quote: Ignorant men don't know what good they hold in their hands until they've flung it away.
general.author: Sophocles

general.quote: You can't trust without risk but neither can you live in a cocoon.
general.author: Byron Pulsifer

general.quote: I've never seen a smiling face that was not beautiful.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: You might well remember that nothing can bring you success but yourself.
general.author: Napoleon Hill

general.quote: Don't miss all the beautiful colors of the rainbow looking for that pot of gold.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: You don't drown by falling in water. You drown by staying there.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Never tell me the sky�s the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
general.author: Unknown

general.quote: Don't look back. Something might be gaining on you.
general.author: Satchel Paige

We don’t know what causes it; we don’t really know if there is only one disease. We just suffer — and keep pouring our sewage into our water supply.

Life isnt about getting and having, its about giving and being.

general.quote: Live so that you can at least get the benefit of the doubt.

general.quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought.

general.quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.

general.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
